1.Name: road
1.ShortDescription: You are at the end of the road.
1.Description: You are standing at the end of a road before a small brick building. Around you is a forest. A small stream flows out of the building and down a gully.

2.Name: hill
2.ShortDescription: You are on a hill in the road.
2.Description: You have walked up a hill, still in the forest. The road slopes back down the other side of the hill. There is a building in the distance.

3.Name: house
3.ShortDescription: You are inside a well house.
3.Description: You are inside a building, a well house for a large spring.

4.Name: valley
4.Description: You are in a valley in the forest beside a stream tumbling along a rocky bed.

5.Name: forest
5.Description: You are in open forest, with a deep valley to one side.

6.Name: forest
6.Description: You are in open forest near both a valley and a road.

7.Name: slit
7.ShortDescription: You are at a slit in the streambed.
7.Description: At your feet all the water of the stream splashes into a 2-inch slit in the rock. Downstream the streambed is bare rock.

8.Name: depression
8.ShortDescription: You are outside of a grate.
8.Description: You are in a 20-foot depression floored with bare dirt. Set into the dirt is a strong steel grate mounted in concrete. A dry streambed leads into the depression.

9.Name: entrance
9.Description: You are in a small chamber beneath a 3 by 3 steel grate to the surface. A low crawl over cobbles leads inward to the west.

10.Name: crawl
10.ShortDescription: You are in a cobble crawl.
10.Description: You are crawling over cobbles in a low passage. There is a dim light at the east end of the passage.

11.Name: debris
11.ShortDescription: You are in a room full of debris.
11.Description:
You are in a debris room filled with stuff washed in from the surface. 
A low wide passage with cobbles becomes plugged with mud and debris here, but an awkward canyon leads upward and west. 
<break time='1s'/>
A note on the wall says 'Magic word <say-as interpret-as='characters'>XYZZY</say-as>'.

79.Name: pipes
79.ShortDescription: You are at sewer pipes. You can't get out this way.
79.Description: The stream flows out through a pair of 1 foot diameter sewer pipes. It would be advisable to use the exit.
